itemLabel: John Montagu Douglas Scott, 7th Duke of Buccleuch

wikipedia_page.main: John Charles Montagu Douglas Scott, 7th Duke of Buccleuch and 9th Duke of Queensberry,  (30 March 1864 – 19 October 1935), styled The Honourable John Montagu Douglas Scott until 1884, Lord John Montagu Douglas Scott between 1884 and 1886 and Earl of Dalkeith until 1914 was a Scottish Member of Parliament and peer.
